key.name: ngrok-binary-path
key.description: Absolute path to the ngrok executable used when starting tunnels.

key.name: config-path
key.description: Optional override path to ngrok config file. If empty, defaults to ~/.config/ngrok/ngrok.yml.

key.name: api-base-url
key.summary: Base URL for ngrok local API
key.description: Where the extension polls for active tunnels.

key.name: cloud-api-key
key.description: API key used to query ngrok cloud API (stored locally). This is configured from the preferences window.

key.name: cloud-account-email
key.description: Cached account email fetched from ngrok cloud API.

key.name: cloud-plan-name
key.description: Cached plan name fetched from ngrok cloud API when available.

key.name: max-concurrent-tunnels
key.description: Maximum number of tunnels to allow from the UI. 0 means unknown/unset.
